page.title: 10MR.HURRELL'S AFTERNOON.
page.content: The afternoon sesion begins at 1.15 and we work through to break at 2.25. The final session begins at 2.40 finishing at 2.45. After school I may,(depending on the day) run a computer club, cross country running club until 5.00,or attend an in-service teacher training course. If not I mark, prepare work or set up displays till about 5.30 then leave for home. During the evenings(apart from schoolwork)I undertake voluntary instruction on behalf of The Institute of Advanced Motorists, preparing candidates for the Advanced Test.I also have to find time to keep a house and 0.5 acres of garden under control. We usually give up and go to bed at around 11.00.
